label: includedPolygon
comment: A polygon included in this geographical multi-surface.
The polygon included for this referenced location.
The polygon included in this geographical feature.
The polygon included in this geographical surface.

rangeIncludes.comment: A planar surface, defined by one exterior boundary and zero or more interior boundaries. Each interior boundary defines a hole in the polygon.

domainIncludes.comment: Representation of real world phenomenon associated with a location relative to the Earth, such as cities, buildings, roads, rivers, forests and lakes.
A collection of surfaces on the Earth (reference ISO 19136).
A figure on the Earth having only two dimensions (reference ISO 19136).
A reference to a physical location or place.
